WasteFootprint.name: WasteFootprint
WasteFootprint.description: Represents the volume of aggregated waste and carbon emissions from waste generated either as part of operations or during the end- of- life of a product.

AnnualEmssnInventoryId.description: The emissions inventory associated with the aggregate waste footprint emissions.

AuditApprovalStatus.description: The status of audit approval for this waste footprint record.

EndDate.description: The date until when the waste-usage data is sent for reporting.

GeneratedWasteDetailRecordCnt.description: The number of generated waste records associated with this waste footprint record.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the waste footprint record and the associated energy use records are locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ReportingDate.description: The date when this waste footprint record data is due to be sent to a reporting body.

Scope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 1 emissions value that’s calculated based on scope 1 emissions from the associated generated waste records.

Scope3EmssnSrcId.description: The scope 3 emissions source record associated with the waste related to non-stationary assets, such as waste related to the end-of-life treatment of sold products.

Scp3DnstrmEndLifeSoldPrdct.description: The scope 3 downstream emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products. This value is calculated based on the scope 3 downstream emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products of the associated generated waste records.

Scp3UpstrmWstGenInOper.description: The scope 3 upstream emissions from the waste generated in operations. This value is calculated based on the scope 3 upstream emissions from waste generated in operations of the associated generated waste records.

StartDate.description: The date from when the waste-usage data is sent for reporting.

StnryAssetEnvrSrcId.description: The stationary asset environmental source record associated with the waste related to stationary assets, such as the waste generated in operations.

SuplScope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The supplemental scope 1 emissions value that’s added to the total scope 1 emissions.

SuplScp3DnstrmEndLifeSoldPrdct.description: The supplemental downstream scope 3 emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products. This value is added to the total scope 3 downstream emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products.

SuplScp3UpstrmWstGenInOper.description: The supplemental upstream scope 3 emissions from the waste generated in operations. This value is added to the total scope 3 upstream emissions from waste generated in operations.

TotalWasteQuantityinTonnes.description: The total quantity of waste in tonnes that’s calculated based on the associated generated waste records.
